targets.expr:
(100 - cpu_idle{job=~"$job", job!="virtual_hosts", alias=~"$alias", cpu=~"$cpu"})
or
absent(cpu_idle{job=~"$job", job!="virtual_hosts", alias=~"$alias", cpu=~"$cpu"}) * 0

(100 - cpu_idle{job=~"$job", job!="virtual_hosts", alias=~"$alias", cpu=~"$cpu"})
or
absent(cpu_idle{job=~"$job", job!="virtual_hosts", alias=~"$alias", cpu=~"$cpu"}) * 0

# (100 - cpu_idle{job=~"$job", alias=~"$alias", cpu=~"$cpu"}) - (cpu_system_load{job=~"$job", alias=~"$alias", cpu=~"$cpu"} + cpu_user_load{job=~"$job", alias=~"$alias", cpu=~"$cpu"})

(
  (
    (100 - cpu_idle{job=~"$job", job!="virtual_hosts", alias=~"$alias", cpu=~"$cpu"})
    or
    (absent(cpu_idle{job=~"$job", job!="virtual_hosts", alias=~"$alias", cpu=~"$cpu"}) * 0)
  )
  -
  (
    cpu_system_load{job=~"$job", alias=~"$alias", cpu=~"$cpu"} +
    cpu_user_load{job=~"$job", alias=~"$alias", cpu=~"$cpu"}
  )
)
or
absent(cpu_idle{job=~"$job", job!="virtual_hosts", alias=~"$alias", cpu=~"$cpu"}) * 0
